data.message: em', i'm trying to get signed. i am the greatest unsigned white rapper alive. watch [ALL] of my videos of me rapping on my facebook timeline. some are better than others. don't base your first impression off of just one video. i go hard. i am a fire ass lyricist, like you. you might have to scroll a while before my videos come up because i've been posting & sharing a lot. help me get a record deal. i am ready. holler at me, big homie. 1
